results.content:
Thanks Akshay for this amazing course!
At first, I was a little lost, but now I can understand many things and even practice.
I still have a long way to go, but right now I am completely happy with my progress! Thank you for your efforts to develop this course, your time and, above all, your desire to help people from all over the world.

results.content: Average, could have been better. Having challenges throughout the course would have been helpful instead of having all of them at the end of the course.
results.content_html: Average, could have been better. Having challenges throughout the course would have been helpful instead of having all of them at the end of the course.

results.content: The introduction to JavaScript background wasn't very informative but once you get into the tutorials the information is very good.  It would be better if the intro explained better what ECMAScript is.
results.content_html: The introduction to JavaScript background wasn't very informative but once you get into the tutorials the information is very good. It would be better if the intro explained better what ECMAScript is.

results.content:
The teacher doesn`t speak fluent english, the subtitle doesn`t match the speech because of his strong indian accent. 
All course have music background making it very difficult to speed up  the video and also there are no real life projects or useful exercise for practice all the theory. I have intermediate javascript knowledge and yet could not understand the teacher approach.

results.content: video is full of annoying music and lacks exercise and no proper instructor engaging
